I Will Survive, Coronavirus version of teachers going online

19 Mar 2020 by Murat Kahveci

“Kept trying hard to mend the pieces of my syllabi
And I spent so many nights just feeling sorry for myself
I used to cry
But now I hold my head up high & you’ll see me
Teaching on zoom…”

“I will survive as long as I know how to Zoom”
